lead_paragraph: Karmichael Hunt has not had the impact on rugby union that Israel Folau has but next month he might finally get his chance to join his fellow double code-hopper on the test stage for the Wallabies.

headline.print_headline: Australia's Centre Shortage Is Hunt's Opportunity
headline.main: Australia's Centre Shortage Is Hunt's Opportunity

snippet: Karmichael Hunt has not had the impact on rugby union that Israel Folau has but next month he might finally get his chance to join his fellow double code-hopper on the test stage for the Wallabies....
